attributes.action: create a regulating body for all tradesmen/builders working on domestic properties in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A regulatory body that works to protect the individual/client that needs building/trade work of any discription in a domestic property. Regulations that demand any tradesmen to be registered and accountable for the quality, punctuality and price of any domestic job to protect the home owners from being ripped off & to reduce the dificulty of finding a quality tradesmen.
